page.title: 05Education (continued)
page.content: The playgroup is held at the Village hall on Tuesdays from 9.30a.m.-11a.m. Children come from Ardargie, Forgandenny and Aberdalgie.The children are aged 3-5 years. The children play mainly with water, sand and paint.The leaders teach them how to climb and the children also sing songs. The children are often read stories too. The children pay 60p each week which is not a very expensive fee. The playgroup leaders hold a few fund raising activities such as "Jumble Sales" and "Coffee Mornings". The money they raise goes towards outings and the playgroup itself which needs items such as paint, sand, containers, books and toys. The children are aged between 3 and 5 years of age.
